name: Swedish Physical Society
goal: Founded in 1921 the Swedish Physical Society has as its purpose to strengthen research into the physical sciences and its applications, and to inform the public concerning physics research and education, and as part of this work to stimulate interest in physical sciences and increase the interaction between physicists and the public.
interests: Budget, Education, Energy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Funding and budget for European research programs such as the Horizon-2020.
